page.title: 03History of Ringmer - 1
page.content: { { {Sir William Springett}of Broyle Place was a great parliamentarian who died in 1643 at the age of twenty-three. His daughter{Gulielma,}born after his death, married {William Penn}the Quaker who was founder of Pennsylvania, USA. This colony for persecuted co-religionists was founded in 1681. {John Harvard,}a Cambridge educated clergyman emigrated to America and founded the University that bears his name. He married {Ann Sadler,} daughter of the Vicar of Ringmer, at Malling in 1696.
